title: Tribunal

replies.body:
Tribunal is still work in progress (globally). 
All reports are recorded and we are using those reports to deal with toxic players internally

Okay thanks, im really fed up with the community, way to toxic (ie. telling me to uninstall and go hang myself ect.)
{{item:3145}}  {{community}}

For more details on current and future Player Behaviour initiatives, [check out the FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq) posted here. It could answer a bunch other questions you might have.
